title: With Love from Diana: the Princess of Wales' Personal Astrologer Shares Her First-Hand Account of Diana's Turbulent Years
description: The woman who served as Princess Diana's personal astrologer for six years tells the inside story of the royal marriage, the Windsors, the voice on the "Squidgie Tapes," and why Charles never renounced his affair with Camilla Parker-Bowles. Original.
author: Penny Thornton
